interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Columbo: The Complete Series
Review Date: 2013/07/22
Store: Peter Falk  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Today's Deals, Editor's Picks
Product Description: ['Legendary Peter Falk is a four-time Primetime Emmy Award-winner for his iconic role as the beloved, trenchcoat-wearing Police Lieutenant Columbo. Columbo is the landmark series that inspired a genre. And now, for the first time ever, all 69 episodes from its seven seasons and all 24 television movies are together in this 34-disc anthology. Every criminal, every innocent victim (and some not-so-innocent ones), and every wily deduction are here in one definitive collection. Seemingly befuddled but always brilliant, the cigar-chomping detective will have you following the clues and asking "just one more thing" until the last case is cracked.   Note: This set contains 34 discs which are contained in 8 cases.']
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 5.12 Pounds', 'Media Format': 'Color, Full Screen, Widescreen, NTSC', 'Run time': '99 hours and 52 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 16, 2012', 'Actors': 'Peter Falk', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Mono), Unknown (Dolby Digital 2.0 Mono), English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Stereo)', 'Studio': 'Universal', 'Number of discs': '34'}
Review Text: This will be our Winter entertainment and really looking forward to it. Missed out on Gold Box deal but caught it on sale later and great savings. Loved the "Due South" boxed set.
Review Title: Not viewed yet.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Columbo: The Complete Series
Peter Falk  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Today's Deals, Editor's Picks
['Legendary Peter Falk is a four-time Primetime Emmy Award-winner for his iconic role as the beloved, trenchcoat-wearing Police Lieutenant Columbo. Columbo is the landmark series that inspired a genre. And now, for the first time ever, all 69 episodes from its seven seasons and all 24 television movies are together in this 34-disc anthology. Every criminal, every innocent victim (and some not-so-innocent ones), and every wily deduction are here in one definitive collection. Seemingly befuddled but always brilliant, the cigar-chomping detective will have you following the clues and asking "just one more thing" until the last case is cracked.   Note: This set contains 34 discs which are contained in 8 cases.']

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** Primarily focuses on classic television series, particularly those that are iconic and feature strong storytelling elements. Enjoys detective genres and character-driven narratives, as evidenced by a preference for series starring notable actors. 

- **Buying Behavior:** Shows a tendency to seek out deals and discounts, indicating a value-driven purchasing approach. The user appreciates bundled collections and seems to prioritize complete series for in-depth viewing experiences.

- **Content Consumption:** Plans to use purchases for seasonal entertainment, suggesting a preference for binge-watching and enjoying long-form content during specific times, such as winter. 

- **Rating Pattern:** Has high standards for quality, reflected in a near-perfect rating for previous purchases and an anticipation of enjoyment before viewing. 

- **Engagement with Media:** Open to exploring shows via collections that offer a comprehensive look at a series, including both episodic content and spin-off or related films. 

This profile establishes the user as someone who enjoys classic cinema and television, values savings, and seeks out comprehensive collections to immerse themselves in their viewing experiences.
